price: Afei εno akyiri no sԑ Onyankopͻn pԑ a, Ɔbԑtie obi a ᴐsakra n’adwen, efirisε Nyankopͻn ne Bͻnefakyε Hene, Ɔne Mmͻborͻhunufoͻ Hene.
arabic: ثُمَّ يَتُوبُ ٱللَّهُ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُۗ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: thumma yatūbu al-lahu min baʿdi dhālika ʿalā man yashāu wal-lahu ghafūrun raḥīmun
